ai-mn62:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ai-mn62:2.1_0: Then the Buddha robed up in the morning and, taking his bowl and robe, entered Sāvatthī for alms.
ai-mn62:2.2_0: Venerable Rāhula, robed up in the morning and, taking his bowl and robe, followed behind the Buddha.
ai-mn62:3.1_0: Then the Buddha looked back at Rāhula and said,
ai-mn62:3.2_0: “Rāhula, you should truly see any kind of form at all—past, future, or present; internal or external; coarse or fine; inferior or superior; far or near: *all* form—with right understanding: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’”
ai-mn62:3.3_0: “Only form, Blessed One? Only form, Holy One?”
ai-mn62:3.4_0: “Form, Rāhula, as well as feeling and perception and choices and consciousness.”
ai-mn62:4.1_0: So Rāhula, after going for the instruction, he tried to advise the Buddha and instructed him in the presence of the Buddha.
ai-mn62:5.1_0: Venerable Sāriputta saw him sitting there,
ai-mn62:5.4_0: When mindfulness of breathing is developed and cultivated it’s very fruitful and beneficial.”
ai-mn62:6.1_0: Then in the late afternoon, Rāhula came out of retreat, went to the Buddha.
ai-mn62:6.1_2: Seated to one side, Rāhula said to the Buddha:
ai-mn62:7.1_0: “Sir, how is mindfulness of breathing developed and cultivated to be very fruitful and beneficial?”
ai-mn62:8.1_0: “Rāhula, the interior earth element is said to be anything hard, solid, and appropriated that’s internal, pertaining to an individual. This includes:
ai-mn62:8.2_0: head hair, body hair, nails, teeth, skin, flesh, sinews, bones, bone marrow, kidneys, heart, liver, diaphragm, spleen, lungs, intestines, mesentery, undigested food, feces, or anything else hard, solid, and appropriated that’s internal, pertaining to an individual.
ai-mn62:8.3_0: This is called the interior earth element.
ai-mn62:8.4_0: The interior earth element and the exterior earth element are just the earth element.
ai-mn62:8.5_0: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
ai-mn62:8.6_0: When you truly see with right understanding, you grow disillusioned with the earth element, detaching the mind from the earth element.
ai-mn62:9.1_0: And what is the water element?
ai-mn62:9.2_0: The water element may be interior or exterior.
ai-mn62:9.3_0: And what is the interior water element?
ai-mn62:9.4_0: Anything that’s water, watery, and appropriated that’s internal, pertaining to an individual. This includes
ai-mn62:9.5_0: it’s just a little bit of blood, a urine, spit, or pus, or blood.
ai-mn62:9.6_0: This is called the interior water element.
ai-mn62:9.7_0: The interior water element and the exterior water element are just the water element.
ai-mn62:9.8_0: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
ai-mn62:9.9_0: When you truly see with right understanding, you grow disillusioned with the water element, detaching the mind from the water element.
ai-mn62:10.1_0: And what is the fire element?
ai-mn62:10.2_0: The fire element may be interior or exterior.
ai-mn62:10.3_0: And what is the interior fire element?
ai-mn62:10.4_0: Anything that’s fire, fiery, and appropriated that’s internal, pertaining to an individual. This includes
ai-mn62:10.5_0: that which warms, that which heats you up when feverish, that which properly digests food and drink, or anything else that’s fire, fiery, and appropriated that’s internal, pertaining to an individual.
ai-mn62:10.6_0: This is called the interior fire element.
ai-mn62:10.7_0: The interior fire element and the exterior fire element are just the fire element.
ai-mn62:10.8_0: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
ai-mn62:10.9_0: When you truly see with right understanding, you grow disillusioned with the fire element, detaching the mind from the fire element.
ai-mn62:11.1_0: And what is the air element?
ai-mn62:11.2_0: The air element may be interior or exterior.
ai-mn62:11.3_0: And what is the interior air element?
ai-mn62:11.4_0: Anything that’s air, airy, and appropriated that’s internal, pertaining to an individual. This includes
ai-mn62:11.5_0: winds that go up or down, winds in the belly or the bowels, winds that flow through the limbs, in-breaths and out-breaths, or anything else that’s wind, windy, and appropriated that’s internal, pertaining to an individual.
ai-mn62:11.6_0: This is called the interior air element.
ai-mn62:11.7_0: The interior air element and the exterior air element are just the air element.
ai-mn62:11.8_0: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
ai-mn62:11.9_0: When you truly see with right understanding, you reject the air element, detaching the mind from the air element.
ai-mn62:12.1_0: And what is the space element?
ai-mn62:12.2_0: The space element may be interior or exterior.
ai-mn62:12.3_0: And what is the interior space element?
ai-mn62:12.4_0: Anything that’s space, spacious, and appropriated that’s internal, pertaining to an individual. This includes:
ai-mn62:12.5_0: the ear canals, nostrils, and mouth; and the space for swallowing what is eaten and drunk, the space where it stays, and the space for excreting it from the nether regions.
ai-mn62:12.6_0: This is called the interior space element.
ai-mn62:12.7_0: The interior space element and the exterior space element are just the space element.
ai-mn62:12.8_0: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
ai-mn62:12.9_0: When you truly see with right understanding, you reject the space element, detaching the mind from the space element.
ai-mn62:13.2_0: For when you meditate on earth, the earth doesn’t occupy your mind.
ai-mn62:13.3_0: Suppose they were to toss both clean and unclean things on the earth, like feces, urine, spit, pus, and blood. The earth isn’t horrified, repelled, and disgusted because of this.
ai-mn62:13.4_0: In the same way, meditate like the earth.
ai-mn62:13.5_0: For when you meditate on earth, the earth doesn’t occupy your mind.
ai-mn62:14.2_0: For when you meditate on water, the Realized One’s mind will not occupy your mind.
ai-mn62:14.3_0: Suppose they were to wash both clean and unclean things in water, like feces, urine, spit, pus, and blood. The water isn’t horrified, repelled, and disgusted because of this.
ai-mn62:14.4_0: In the same way, meditate like water.
ai-mn62:14.5_0: For when you meditate on water, the Realized One’s mind will not occupy your mind.
ai-mn62:15.2_0: For when you meditate on fire, the mind will not occupy your mind.
ai-mn62:15.3_0: Suppose a fire were to burn both clean and unclean things, like feces, urine, spit, pus, and blood. The fire isn’t horrified, repelled, and disgusted because of this.
ai-mn62:15.4_0: In the same way, meditate like fire.
ai-mn62:15.5_0: For when you meditate on fire, the mind will not occupy your mind.
ai-mn62:16.2_0: For when you meditate on some, the mind will not occupy your mind.
ai-mn62:16.3_0: Suppose the wind were to blow on both clean and unclean things, like feces, urine, spit, pus, and blood. The wind isn’t horrified, repelled, and disgusted because of this.
ai-mn62:16.4_0: In the same way, meditate like the wind.
ai-mn62:16.5_0: For when you meditate on some, the mind will not occupy your mind.
ai-mn62:17.2_0: For when you meditate on space in the air, both pleasant and unpleasant thoughts don’t occupy your mind.
ai-mn62:17.3_0: Just as space is not established anywhere,
ai-mn62:17.4_0: in the same way, meditate like space.
ai-mn62:17.5_0: For when you meditate on space in the air, both pleasant and unpleasant thoughts don’t occupy your mind.
ai-mn62:18.2_0: For when you meditate on love any ill will be given up.
ai-mn62:19.2_0: For when you meditate on compassion any cruelty will be given up.
ai-mn62:20.2_0: For when you meditate on rejoicing any negativity will be given up.
ai-mn62:21.1_0: For when you meditate on equanimity any repulsion will be given up.
ai-mn62:22.2_0: For when you meditate on ugliness any lust will be given up.
ai-mn62:23.2_0: For when you meditate on impermanence any conceit ‘I am’ will be given up.
ai-mn62:24.2_0: When mindfulness of breathing is developed and cultivated it’s very fruitful and beneficial.
ai-mn62:24.3_0: And how is mindfulness of breathing developed and cultivated to be very fruitful and beneficial?
ai-mn62:25.1_0: It’s when a mendicant has gone to a wilderness, or to the root of a tree, or to an empty hut. They sit down cross-legged, with their body straight, and establish mindfulness right there. ...
ai-mn62:25.2_0: Just mindful, they breath in. Mindful, they breath out.
ai-mn62:26.1_0: When breathing in heavily they know: ‘I’m breathing in heavily.’ When breathing out heavily they know: ‘I’m breathing out heavily.’
ai-mn62:26.3_0: They practice breathing in experiencing the whole body. They practice breathing out experiencing the whole body.
ai-mn62:26.4_1: They practice breathing out stilling the body’s motion.
ai-mn62:27.1_0: They practice breathing in experiencing rapture. They practice breathing out experiencing rapture.
ai-mn62:27.2_0: They practice breathing in experiencing bliss. They practice breathing out experiencing bliss.
ai-mn62:27.3_0: They practice breathing in experiencing these emotions.
ai-mn62:27.3_1: They practice breathing out experiencing these emotions.
ai-mn62:27.4_1: They practice breathing out stilling these emotions.
ai-mn62:28.1_0: They practice breathing in experiencing the mind. They practice breathing out experiencing the mind.
ai-mn62:28.2_0: They practice breathing in gladdening the mind. They practice breathing out gladdening the mind.
ai-mn62:28.3_0: They practice breathing in immersing the mind. They practice breathing out immersing the mind.
ai-mn62:28.4_0: They practice breathing in freeing the mind. They practice breathing out freeing the mind.
ai-mn62:29.1_0: They practice breathing in observing impermanence. They practice breathing out observing impermanence.
ai-mn62:29.2_0: They practice breathing in observing fading away. They practice breathing out observing fading away.
ai-mn62:29.3_0: They practice breathing in observing cessation. They practice breathing out observing cessation.
ai-mn62:29.4_0: They practice breathing in observing letting go. They practice breathing out observing letting go.
ai-mn62:30.1_0: Mindfulness of breathing, when developed and cultivated in this way, is very fruitful and beneficial.
ai-mn62:30.2_0: When mindfulness of breathing is developed and cultivated in this way, even when the final breaths in and out cease, they are known, not unknown.”
ai-mn62:30.3_0: This is what the Buddha said.
ai-mn62:30.4_0: Satisfied, Venerable Rāhula was happy with what the Buddha said.
